channel.title: STAMINA Updates
channel.description: Updates and news regarding STAMINA development

item.title: STAMINA/STORM Submitted to QEST'23
item.description: Submitted as Tool Paper to QEST'23

item.title: STAMINA/STORM 2.2.5 Released
item.description: Included code cleanup, namespace reorganization, and speed improvements.

item.title: STAMINA/STORM 2.0 Released
item.description: First usable version of STAMINA 2.0 algorithm implemented in STAMINA/STORM.

item.title: STAMINA/STORM Integration has dedicated developer: Josh Jeppson
item.description: Josh Jeppson takes over STAMINA/STORM codebase.

item.title: STAMINA 2.0 Accepted into VMCAI'22"
item.description: Riley Roberts improves the STAMINA algorithm to allow for more efficient re-exploration of states and prevention of "lost" probability.

item.title: New STAMINA Maintainer: Riley Roberts
item.description: Riley Roberts takes over STAMINA codebase.

item.title: STAMINA 1.0 Accepted into CAV'19
item.description: STAMINA 1.0 (integrated with PRISM) was accepted to CAV 2019 on April 17. This version of STAMINA is developed by Thakur Neupane
